title: How is housing in Lakeshore, managed by the WHA, assigned and how do folks making more than $85,000 a year qualify for this subsidized housing? Also, is there a COVENANT that allows only White Citizens?
text:
I'm not clear about what you are asking. If you are referring to
Lakeshore Commons, that is not run by the WHA. As far as eligibility
requirements for WHA housing units, it varies depending on income and
family size. For details: http://www.wha.net/
